Changelog
---------

0.4 (2010-08-04)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 - use transcode.daemon 0.4 and simplify the buildout [dimo]


0.3 (2010-07-31)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 - workaround for plone.app.blob issue with unicode filenames [dimo]
 - fix forced retranscoding for pending requests [dimo]


0.2 (2010-07-23)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 - First public release
   [dimo]
